meanings.definition: A device for recording and playing back video images.
meanings.sent1: My dad showed me how to use the videorecorders to watch our family vacation videos.
meanings.sent2: The videorecorders at the store were all sold out due to high demand.
meanings.sent3: The videorecorders decided to take a break after working non-stop for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a videorecorder, capturing every detail of the event.
meanings.sent5: The videorecorders hummed softly as they recorded the school play.

meanings.definition: The act or process of recording video images.
meanings.sent1: Watching the videorecorders in action was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The videorecorders of the security cameras helped catch the thief.
meanings.sent3: The videorecorders seemed to be having a dance-off with their blinking lights.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a videorecorder, storing every moment of the trip.
meanings.sent5: The videorecorders whirred as they captured the beauty of the sunset.
